column4: can any one help me with samba it wont associate the machines ip with there name
did you tell the machines about your wins server?
wins is dissabled though my windoze machine can see the file on unbuntu and ubuntu can see the file only when the ip is entered
let your samba box do wins support and then tell the windoze box to look at the samba box for wins
I'm not sure how to do it using supported methods, but what you need to do is turn on wins support in samba, then point your windoze boxes at the samba box for wins support

do you have the windoze boxes pointed at the samba box for wins?
